column2: select AD.TRANSACTION_ID, AD.MOBILE_NO, AD.PAYMENT_TYPE, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(AD.OPERATION_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as OPERATION_DTM, AD.REQUEST_ACTION, AD.ADJUST_VALUE from PMDB..PM_ADJUST_BOS AD inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH B on (AD.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID) where B.ORDER_ID = @order_id
